   20: 
   21: 
   22: -module(trace_port_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   25: 	 call_trace/1,
   26: 	 return_trace/1,
   27: 	 send/1,
   28: 	 receive_trace/1,
   29: 	 receive_trace_non_scheduler/1,
   30: 	 process_events/1,
   31: 	 schedule/1,
   32: 	 gc/1,
   33: 	 default_tracer/1,
   34: 	 tracer_port_crash/1]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: 
   38: suite() ->
   39:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   40:      {timetrap, {minutes, 2}}].
   41: 
   42: all() ->
   43:     [call_trace, return_trace, send, receive_trace,
   44:      receive_trace_non_scheduler,
   45:      process_events, schedule, gc,
   46:      default_tracer, tracer_port_crash].
   47: 
   48: %% Test sending call trace messages to a port.
   49: call_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   50:     start_tracer(Config),
   51:     Self = self(),
   52:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, []),
   53:     trace_pid(Self, true, [call]),
   54:     trace_info(Self, flags),
   55:     trace_info(Self, tracer),
   56:     [b,a] = lists:reverse([a,b]),
   57:     expect({trace,Self,call,{lists,reverse,[[a,b]]}}),
   58: 
   59:     trace_pid(Self, true, [timestamp]),
   60:     trace_info(Self, flags),
   61:     Huge = huge_data(),
   62:     lists:reverse(Huge),
   63:     expect({trace_ts,Self,call,{lists,reverse,[Huge]},ts}),
   64: 
   65:     trace_pid(Self, true, [arity]),
   66:     trace_info(Self, flags),
   67:     [y,x] = lists:reverse([x,y]),
   68:     expect({trace_ts,Self,call,{lists,reverse,1},ts}),
   69: 
   70:     trace_pid(Self, false, [timestamp]),
   71:     trace_info(Self, flags),
   72:     [z,y,x] = lists:reverse([x,y,z]),
   73:     expect({trace,Self,call,{lists,reverse,1}}),
   74: 
   75:     %% OTP-7399. Delayed sub-binary creation optimization.
   76:     trace_pid(Self, false, [arity]),
   77:     trace_info(Self, flags),
   78:     trace_func({?MODULE,bs_sum_c,2}, [], [local]),
   79:     26 = bs_sum_c(<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 0),
   80:     trace_func({?MODULE,bs_sum_c,2}, false, [local]),
   81:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>,0]}}),
   82:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<5:4,7:4,11:4>>,3]}}),
   83:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<7:4,11:4>>,8]}}),
   84:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<11:4>>,15]}}),
   85:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<>>,26]}}),
   86: 
   87:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, false),
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: bs_sum_c(<<H:4,T/bits>>, Acc) -> bs_sum_c(T, H+Acc);
   91: bs_sum_c(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
   92: 
   93: 
   94: %% Test the new return trace.
   95: return_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     start_tracer(Config),
   97:     Self = self(),
   98:     MFA = {lists,reverse,1},
   99: 
  100:     %% Plain (no timestamp, small data).
  101: 
  102:     trace_func(MFA, [{['$1'],[],[{return_trace},
  103:                                  {message,false}]}]),
  104:     trace_pid(Self, true, [call]),
  105:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  106:     trace_info(Self, tracer),
  107:     trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  108:     {traced,global} = trace_info(MFA, traced),
  109:     [b,a] = lists:reverse([a,b]),
  110:     expect({trace,Self,return_from,MFA,[b,a]}),
  111: 
  112:     %% Timestamp, huge data.
  113:     trace_pid(Self, true, [timestamp]),
  114:     Result = lists:reverse(huge_data()),
  115:     expect({trace_ts,Self,return_from,MFA,Result,ts}),
  116: 
  117:     %% Turn off trace.
  118:     trace_func(MFA, false),
  119:     trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  120:     {traced,false} = trace_info(MFA, traced),
  121:     ok.
  122: 
  123: %% Test sending send trace messages to a port.
  124: send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     Tracer = start_tracer(Config),
  126:     Self = self(),
  127:     Sender = fun_spawn(fun sender/0),
  128:     trac(Sender, true, [send]),
  129: 
  130:     %% Simple message, no timestamp.
  131: 
  132:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 10)),
  133:     Msg = {some_data,Bin},
  134:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),Msg},
  135:     receive Msg -> ok end,
  136:     expect({trace,Sender,send,Msg,Self}),
  137: 
  138:     %% Timestamp.
  139: 
  140:     BiggerMsg = {even_bigger,Msg},
  141:     trac(Sender, true, [send,timestamp]),
  142:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),BiggerMsg},
  143:     receive BiggerMsg -> ok end,
  144:     expect({trace_ts,Sender,send,BiggerMsg,Self,ts}),
  145: 
  146:     %% Huge message.
  147: 
  148:     HugeMsg = huge_data(),
  149:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),HugeMsg},
  150:     receive HugeMsg -> ok end,
  151:     expect({trace_ts,Sender,send,HugeMsg,Self,ts}),
  152: 
  153:     %% Kill trace port and force a trace.  The emulator should not crasch.
  154: 
  155:     unlink(Tracer),
  156:     exit(Tracer, kill),
  157:     erlang:yield(),				% Make sure that port gets killed.
  158:     Sender ! {send_please,Self,good_bye},
  159:     receive good_bye -> ok end,
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: %% Test sending receive traces to a port.
  163: receive_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     start_tracer(Config),
  165:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  166:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  167: 
  168:     Receiver ! {hello,world},
  169:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',{hello,world}}),
  170: 
  171:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive',timestamp]),
  172:     Huge = {hello,huge_data()},
  173:     Receiver ! {hello,huge_data()},
  174:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,'receive',Huge,ts}),
  175:     ok.
  176: 
  177: %% Test sending receive traces to a port.
  178: receive_trace_non_scheduler(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  179:     start_tracer(Config),
  180:     S = self(),
  181:     Receiver = spawn_link(
  182:                  fun() ->
  183:                          receive
  184:                              go ->
  185:                                  Ref = S ! erlang:trace_delivered(all),
  186:                                  receive {trace_delivered, Ref, all} -> ok end
  187:                          end
  188:                  end),
  189:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  190:     Receiver ! go,
  191:     Ref = receive R -> R end,
  192:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',go}),
  193:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',{trace_delivered, all, Ref}}),
  194: 
  195:     ok.
  196: 
  197: %% Tests a few process events (like getting linked).
  198: process_events(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  199:     start_tracer(Config),
  200:     Self = self(),
  201:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  202:     trac(Receiver, true, [procs]),
  203: 
  204:     unlink(Receiver),				%It is already linked.
  205:     expect({trace,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self}),
  206:     link(Receiver),
  207:     expect({trace,Receiver,getting_linked,Self}),
  208:     trac(Receiver, true, [procs,timestamp]),
  209:     unlink(Receiver),
  210:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self,ts}),
  211:     link(Receiver),
  212:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_linked,Self,ts}),
  213: 
  214:     unlink(Receiver),
  215:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self,ts}),
  216:     Huge = huge_data(),
  217:     exit(Receiver, Huge),
  218:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,exit,Huge,ts}),
  219: 
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: %% Test sending scheduling events to a port.
  223: schedule(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  224:     start_tracer(Config),
  225:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  226:     trac(Receiver, true, [running]),
  227: 
  228:     Receiver ! hi,
  229:     expect({trace,Receiver,in,{?MODULE,receiver,0}}),
  230:     expect({trace,Receiver,out,{?MODULE,receiver,0}}),
  231: 
  232:     trac(Receiver, true, [running,timestamp]),
  233: 
  234:     Receiver ! hi_again,
  235:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,in,{?MODULE,receiver,0},ts}),
  236:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,out,{?MODULE,receiver,0},ts}),
  237: 
  238:     ok.
  239: 
  240: %% Test sending garbage collection events to a port.
  241: gc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  242:     start_tracer(Config),
  243:     Garber = fun_spawn(fun garber/0, [{min_heap_size, 5000}]),
  244:     trac(Garber, true, [garbage_collection]),
  245:     trace_info(Garber, flags),
  246: 
  247:     trace_info(Garber, flags),
  248:     Garber ! hi,
  249:     expect({trace,Garber,gc_major_start,info}),
  250:     expect({trace,Garber,gc_major_end,info}),
  251: 
  252:     trac(Garber, true, [garbage_collection,timestamp]),
  253:     Garber ! hi,
  254:     expect({trace_ts,Garber,gc_major_start,info,ts}),
  255:     expect({trace_ts,Garber,gc_major_end,info,ts}),
  256: 
  257:     ok.
  258: 
  259: %% Test a port as default tracer.
  260: default_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  261:     Tracer = start_tracer(Config),
  262:     TracerMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, Tracer),
  263:     Port = get(tracer_port),
  264:     %%
  265:     N = erlang:trace(all, true, [send, {tracer, Port}]),
  266:     {flags, [send]} = erlang:trace_info(self(), flags),
  267:     {tracer, Port} = erlang:trace_info(self(), tracer),
  268:     {flags, [send]} = erlang:trace_info(new, flags),
  269:     {tracer, Port} = erlang:trace_info(new, tracer),
  270:     G1 = fun_spawn(fun general/0),
  271:     {flags, [send]} = erlang:trace_info(G1, flags),
  272:     {tracer, Port} = erlang:trace_info(G1, tracer),
  273:     unlink(Tracer),
  274:     exit(Port, done),
  275:     receive
  276:         {'DOWN', TracerMonitor, process, Tracer, TracerExitReason} ->
  277:             done = TracerExitReason
  278:     end,
  279:     {flags, []} = erlang:trace_info(self(), flags),
  280:     {tracer, []} = erlang:trace_info(self(), tracer),
  281:     {flags, []} = erlang:trace_info(new, flags),
  282:     {tracer, []} = erlang:trace_info(new, tracer),
  283:     M = erlang:trace(all, false, [all]),
  284:     {flags, []} = erlang:trace_info(self(), flags),
  285:     {tracer, []} = erlang:trace_info(self(), tracer),
  286:     {flags, []} = erlang:trace_info(G1, flags),
  287:     {tracer, []} = erlang:trace_info(G1, tracer),
  288:     G1 ! {apply,{erlang,exit,[normal]}},
  289:     io:format("~p = ~p.~n", [M, N]),
  290:     M = N - 1, % G1 has been started, but Tracer and Port have died
  291:     ok.
  292: 
  293: tracer_port_crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  294:     Tr = start_tracer(Config),
  295:     Port = get(tracer_port),
  296:     Tracee = spawn(fun () ->
  297:                            register(trace_port_linker, self()),
  298:                            link(Port),
  299:                            receive go -> ok end,
  300:                            lists:reverse([1,b,c]),
  301:                            receive die -> ok end
  302:                    end),
  303:     Tr ! {unlink_tracer_port, self()},
  304:     receive {unlinked_tracer_port, Tr} -> ok end,
  305:     port_control(Port, $c, []), %Make port commands crash tracer port...
  306:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, []),
  307:     trace_pid(Tracee, true, [call]),
  308:     trace_info(Tracee, flags),
  309:     trace_info(self(), tracer),
  310:     Tracee ! go,
  311:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  312:     case whereis(trace_port_linker) of
  313:         undefined ->
  314:             ok;
  315:         Id ->
  316:             ct:fail({trace_port_linker, Id})
  317:     end,
  318:     undefined = process_info(Tracee),
  319:     ok.
  320: 
  321: %%% Help functions.
  322: 
  323: huge_data() -> huge_data(16384).
  324: huge_data(0) -> [];
  325: huge_data(N) when N rem 2 == 0 ->
  326:     P = huge_data(N div 2),
  327:     [P|P];
  328: huge_data(N) ->
  329:     P = huge_data(N div 2),
  330:     [16#1234566,P|P].
  331: 
  332: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,info,ts}=Message) ->
  333:     receive
  334:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,_Info,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  335:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  336:             MessageTs;
  337:         Other ->
  338:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  339:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  340:     after 5000 ->
  341:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  342:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  343:     end;
  344: expect({trace,E1,E2,info}=Message) ->
  345:     receive
  346:         {trace,E1,E2,_Info}=MessageTs ->
  347:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  348:             MessageTs;
  349:         Other ->
  350:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  351:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  352:     after 5000 ->
  353:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  354:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  355:     end;
  356: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,ts}=Message) ->
  357:     receive
  358:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  359:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  360:             MessageTs;
  361:         Other ->
  362:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  363:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  364:     after 5000 ->
  365:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  366:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  367:     end;
  368: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,E4,ts}=Message) ->
  369:     receive
  370:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,E4,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  371:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  372:             MessageTs;
  373:         Other ->
  374:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  375:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  376:     after 5000 ->
  377:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  378:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  379:     end;
  380: expect(Message) ->
  381:     receive
  382:         Message ->
  383:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [Message]),
  384:             Message;
  385:         Other ->
  386:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  387:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  388:     after 5000 ->
  389:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  390:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  391:     end.
  392: 
  393: trac(What, On, Flags0) ->
  394:     Flags = [{tracer,get(tracer_port)}|Flags0],
  395:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{erlang,trace,[What,On,Flags]}},
  396:     Res = receive
  397:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  398:           end,
  399:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  400:                    [What,On,Flags,Res]),
  401:     Res.
  402: 
  403: trace_info(What, Key) ->
  404:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{erlang,trace_info,[What,Key]}},
  405:     Res = receive
  406:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  407:           end,
  408:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_info(~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  409:                    [What,Key,Res]),
  410:     Res.
  411: 
  412: trace_func(MFA, MatchProg) ->
  413:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{erlang,trace_pattern,[MFA,MatchProg]}},
  414:     Res = receive
  415:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  416:           end,
  417:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_pattern(~p, ~p) -> ~p", [MFA,MatchProg,Res]),
  418:     Res.
  419: 
  420: trace_func(MFA, MatchProg, Flags) ->
  421:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{erlang,trace_pattern,[MFA,MatchProg,Flags]}},
  422:     Res = receive
  423:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  424:           end,
  425:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_pattern(~p, ~p) -> ~p", [MFA,MatchProg,Res]),
  426:     Res.
  427: 
  428: trace_pid(Pid, On, Flags0) ->
  429:     Flags = [{tracer,get(tracer_port)}|Flags0],
  430:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{erlang,trace,[Pid,On,Flags]}},
  431:     Res = receive
  432:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  433:           end,
  434:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  435:                    [Pid,On,Flags,Res]),
  436:     Res.
  437: 
  438: start_tracer(Config) ->
  439:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  440:     ok = load_driver(Path, echo_drv),
  441:     Self = self(),
  442:     put(tracer, fun_spawn(fun() -> tracer(Self) end)),
  443:     receive
  444:         {started,Port} ->
  445:             put(tracer_port, Port)
  446:     end,
  447:     get(tracer).
  448: 
  449: load_driver(Dir, Driver) ->
  450:     case erl_ddll:load_driver(Dir, Driver) of
  451:         ok -> ok;
  452:         {error, Error} = Res ->
  453:             io:format("~s\n", [erl_ddll:format_error(Error)]),
  454:             Res
  455:     end.
  456: 
  457: tracer(RelayTo) ->
  458:     Port = open_port({spawn,echo_drv}, [eof,binary]),
  459:     RelayTo ! {started,Port},
  460:     tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port).
  461: 
  462: tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port) ->
  463:     receive
  464:         {apply,From,{M,F,A}} ->
  465:             From ! {apply_result,apply(M, F, A)},
  466:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  467:         {Port,{data,Msg}} ->
  468:             RelayTo ! binary_to_term(Msg),
  469:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  470:         {unlink_tracer_port, From} ->
  471:             unlink(Port),
  472:             From ! {unlinked_tracer_port, self()},
  473:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  474:         Other ->
  475:             exit({bad_message,Other})
  476:     end.
  477: 
  478: fun_spawn(Fun) ->
  479:     spawn_link(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]]).
  480: 
  481: fun_spawn(Fun, Opts) ->
  482:     spawn_opt(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]], [link | Opts]).
  483: 
  484: % flush() ->
  485: %     receive
  486: % 	X ->
  487: % 	    [X | flush()]
  488: %     after 2000 ->
  489: % 	    []
  490: %     end.
  491: 
  492: 
  493: %%% Models for various kinds of processes.
  494: 
  495: %% Sends messages when ordered to.
  496: 
  497: sender() ->
  498:     receive
  499:         {send_please, To, What} ->
  500:             To ! What,
  501:             sender()
  502:     end.
  503: 
  504: %% Just consumes messages from its message queue.
  505: 
  506: receiver() ->
  507:     receive
  508:         _Any -> receiver()
  509:     end.
  510: 
  511: %% Does a garbage collection when it receives a message.
  512: 
  513: garber() ->
  514:     receive
  515:         _Any ->
  516:             lists:seq(1, 100),
  517:             erlang:garbage_collect(),
  518:             garber()
  519:     end.
  520: 
  521: %% All-purpose process
  522: 
  523: general() ->
  524:     receive
  525:         {apply, {M, F, Args}} ->
  526:             erlang:apply(M, F, Args),
  527:             general();
  528:         {send, Dest, Msg} ->
  529:             Dest ! Msg,
  530:             general();
  531:         {call_f_1, Arg} ->
  532:             f(Arg),
  533:             general();
  534:         nop ->
  535:             general()
  536:     end.
  537: 
  538: f(Arg) ->
  539:     Arg.
